author: AntumDeluge
long_description:
Adds some hovercraft vehicles that can be ridden on land or over water.

This is a fork of [stu's hovercraft](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=6722).

Differences from original:

- name changed to `hovercraft_ad`
- updated for Minetest 5.0
- supports localization
- mods used for craft recipes are optional
- craft recipe optionally includes [basic_materials:motor](https://content.minetest.net/packages/VanessaE/basic_materials/)
- hovercrafts are ownable
- includes extended colors by [michyo](https://github.com/michyo/hovercramt)
	- disabled with `hovercraft.extended_colors = false`

### Usage

##### Controls

```
Forward (W)   Thrust
Jump (Space)  Jump
Mouse Move	  Rotate
Sneak (Shift) Sit (only visible in multiplayer)
```

##### Settings

```
mount_ownable
- Makes hovercrafts only usable by owners (owner is determined by player who adds hovercraft to world).
- type:   bool
- defaut: true
```
